src:
Sambut Hari Pahlawan Raja Galuh Pakuan Gelar Turnamen Tenis Meja Berhadiah Total Rp10 Juta
01 Nov 2019, 18:00 by Ruslan Efendi



Sambut Hari Pahlawan Raja Galuh Pakuan Gelar Turnamen Tenis Meja Berhadiah Total Rp10 Juta



Sambut Hari Pahlawan Raja Galuh Pakuan Gelar Turnamen Tenis Meja Berhadiah Total Rp10 Juta


KBRN, Subang : Dalam Rangka menyambut Hari Pahlawan, Raja Lembaga Adat Karatwan (LAK) Galuh Pakuan Rahyang Mandalajati Evi Silviadi, akan menggelar Turnamen tenis meja Galuh Pakuan Seri-II, yang berlangsung 9-10 November 2019, di GOR Gotong Royong Subang.
Turnamen Galuh Pakuan Seri-II, tersebut menurut Ketua Panitia Aan Syadian, memperebutkan piala tetap Raja Galuh Pakuan dan total hadiah sebesar Rp10 juta, serta sertifikat bagi para juara.
"Insya Alloh pada 9 dan 10 November 2019 nanti, Turnamen Tenis Meja Galuh Pakuan Seri-II digelar, memperebutkan piala tetap Raja Galuh Pakuan, dengan total hadiah Rp 10 juta, berikut sertifikat," ujar Aan kepada wartawan di Subang, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Aan mengatakan, turnamen kali ini berbeda dengan turnamen sebelumnya, karena pada turnamen tenis meja Galuh Pakuan Seri-II melibatkan para peserta dari Wilayah IV Jabar plus undangan.
"Untuk turnamen kali ini mengalami peningkatan, baik dari total hadiah, maupun dengan pesererta yang melibatkan dari luar Kabupaten Subang, yakni Cirebon, Indramayu, Purwakarta, Subang, Karawang, dan Bekasi plus undangan dari Bandung dan Kota Bandung," ungkapnya.
Sejak dibuka pendaftaran kata Aan, sudah hampir 50 lebih peserta yang sudah mendaftar ke panitia. Kelas yang dipertandingan di turnamen tenis meja Galuh Pakuan seri-II ini, dibagi dalam 3 kelas pertandingan yakni kelas Veteran, Remaja, dan Umum.
"Di turnamen tenis meja Galuh Pakuan Seri-II nanti, saya rasa akan lebih seru karena akan banyak bertemu para atlit tenis meja yang sudah veteran dari wilayah IV Jabar dan undangan akan ikut memeriahkan turnamen tersebut," terang Aan.
Karena jumlah peserta akan lebih banyak di bandingkan dengan turnamen seri-I Agustus 2019 lalu, maka Panitia memberlakukan sistem pertandingan setengah kompetisi, dan panitia menyiapkan wasit prifesional.
"Ya kalau melihat animo peserta sih Alhamdulillah sudah mulai terlihat banyak, terlebih masih ada waktu sepekan kedepan sampai batas waktu penutupan pendaftaran berakhir, mudah-mudahan masih banyak peserta yang mendaftar ke panitia," imbuhnya.
Aan menambahkan, rencana pembukaan turnamen tenis meja Galuh Pakuan Seri-II akan di buka dan di tutup oleh Bupati Subang Ruhimat, sekaligus pelantikan Ketua PTMSI Kabupaten Subang massa bakti 2019-2023.
text:
Celebrate Heroes' Day Galuh Pakuan Holds a Table Tennis Tournament with a Total Prize of Rp10 Million
Nov 01 2019, 6:00 PM by Ruslan Efendi



Celebrate Heroes' Day Galuh Pakuan Holds a Table Tennis Tournament with a Total Prize of Rp10 Million



Celebrate Heroes' Day Galuh Pakuan Holds a Table Tennis Tournament with a Total Prize of Rp10 Million


KBRN, Subang: In order to welcome Heroes' Day, the King of Karatwan Customary Institution (LAK) Galuh Pakuan Rahyang Mandalajati Evi Silviadi, will hold the Galuh Pakuan Series-II table tennis tournament, which takes place November 9-10 November 2019, at Gotong Royong Subang Gymnasium.
According to Chairperson of the Committee Aan Syadian, Galuh Pakuan Series-II Tournament, fighting over the permanent trophy of Raja Galuh Pakuan and the total prize of Rp10 million, as well as certificates for the champions.
"Insya Alloh on 9 and 10 November 2019, the Galuh Pakuan Series-II Table Tennis Tournament will be held, fighting for the permanent trophy of Raja Galuh Pakuan, with a total prize of Rp 10 million, along with certificates," Aan told reporters in Subang, Friday (1/1) 11/2019).
Aan said, this tournament was different from the previous tournament, because the Galuh Pakuan Series-II table tennis tournament involved participants from Region IV West Java plus an invitation.
"For the tournament this time it has increased, both from the total prizes, as well as by participants involving outside Subang Regency, namely Cirebon, Indramayu, Purwakarta, Subang, Karawang, and Bekasi plus invitations from Bandung and the City of Bandung," he said.
Since opening the registration said Aan, almost 50 more participants have registered with the committee. The classes that are competed in the Galuh Pakuan series-II table tennis tournament are divided into 3 classes, namely the Veterans, Youth and General classes.
"In the Galuh Pakuan Series-II table tennis tournament later, I think it will be more exciting because there will be a lot of meeting of table tennis athletes who are veterans from IV West Java and invitations will also enliven the tournament," explained Aan.
Because the number of participants will be more than that of the August 2019 series I tournament, the Committee put in place a half-competition system, and the committee prepared a professional referee.
"Yes, if you see the participants' interest, Alhamdulillah, it has begun to look a lot, especially there is still a week ahead until the deadline for registration is over, hopefully there are still many participants who register to the committee," he added.
Aan added, the plan to open the Galuh Pakuan Series-II table tennis tournament would be opened and closed by the Regent of Subang Ruhimat, as well as the inauguration of the Head of PTMSI Subang Regency devoted to mass service 2019-2023.
